lyrics:
I'm the best rapper alive, flow so sick, I'm contagious
Dropping bars like it's dangerous, my rhymes are outrageous

I'm singing in the rain, just singing in the rain
What a glorious feeling, I'm happy again

Spitting fire, never tired, my words are inspired
Breaking limits, no limits, my flow is required

Twinkle twinkle little star
How I wonder what you are

Yo, I'm back in the lab with another rap
Stacking up the cash, never looking back
